(Limited to 3 applications because no more buttons can be shown on a notification)

Navigation in the application 
 
From the home screen, swipe down to display the favorites panel and swipe up to hide it. If you swipe up when the favorites panel is hidden, it will display the complete list of applications. 
 
When you are at the top of the complete applications list, swipe down to return to the home screen. 
 
Below the favorites panel, click the button to display the menu of the launcher. This menu allows to refresh the applications list, define the favorites applications and open the settings. 
 
If you hold your finger a few moments on an application, you will be offered to access its system settings. 
 
Applications list update 
 
The applications list and their icons are refreshed only after some events (on start, when an application is added or removed, if the icon pack is modified). If something does not feel right, you should try to refresh the applications list manually.
